titleStmt.title: Sermons of M. Iohn Caluine, vpon the.X.Commandementes of the Lawe, geuen of God by Moses, otherwise called the Decalogue. Gathered word for word, presently at his sermons, when he preached on Deuteronomie, without adding vnto, or diminishing from them any thing afterward. Translated out of Frenche into English, by I.H.
Sermons sur les Dix commandemens. English
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Harmar, John, 1555?-1613.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Sermons sur les Dix commandemens.
Running title reads: Maister Iohn Caluine, vpon the commandementes, &c.
One of three variants of this edition with title page date 1579 and varying vendors.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
